WorkItem.Description:
I'm trying to plan out a un-hittable block set. Currently my planned set has dodge+parry+block+miss = 100% which is the goal. But looking at the miss percent it seems really high. Against a lvl 82 with 1104 def rating my to be missed is listed as 13.51%
I did some research and http://www.tankspot.com/forums/f63/40003-diminishing-returns-avoidance.html has a nice table that says that for 1100 def rating the pre DR miss would be 8.95%. That plus 5% base -.4% (for 2 levels higher) gives 13.55% which is almost exactly what is being reported. The actual chance to be missed from the table though is 5.90% a total difference of about 2.5%
Â 
I've attached the xml for the gear set I was looking at.

Comments.Message: Insect Swarm.  5% base + 3% insect swarm + 5.9%DimRet - 0.4% lvl82 = 13.5%

Thanks, I forgot about the miss effect when I was setting up the raid buffs section. 
This Solves my issue.
